All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Application class instantiates the UI and backend aspect of program.
Board
Board class, is the host of all entities and handles everything related to the gameplay aspect.
BoardReaderAndGenerator
Class used to generate board.
Bomb
The Bomb item class, used to describe how it interacts with board and entities.
CharacterDiscoveryController
The CharacterDiscoveryController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
Clock
The item clock - increases players time by x seconds.
CreditsController
The CreditsController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
Direction
Represents a direction that a moving entity can be facing.
Door
The item door - finished the game if collected.
Enemy
The Entity enemy, holds all data and inherited methods for each enemy.
Entity
Entity class is used to describe all game elements as it is inherited by all.
EntityResources
The Entity resources class - holds all data for entities.
FloorFollowingThief
Class used to describe and store information about FloorFollowing Thief
FlyingAssassin
Class used to describe and store information about FlyingAssassin
FXMLController
The FXMLController used to manage UI interactions of every FXML.
GameController
The GameController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
GameResultController
The GameResultController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
Gate
The gate item - blocks player from moving, can be opened by levers.
GateLeverColour
The enum Gate lever colour.
Item
An abstract class representing Items (Weapons).
LevelLoadController
The LevelLoadController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
Lever
The lever item - opens gates.
LocalizationManager
Used to manage selected language of the user
Loot
The Loot item (4 types) - gives player score on completion.
Loot.LOOT_TYPE
The enum Loot type.
MainMenuController
The MainMenuController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
MOTD
Class that handles returning the Message of the day.
Note
The item note - collect these to find out information about player.
PathFinder
Used to find the shortest path to a reachable entity on the board
Player
The Player class handles the player data and describes how the can act in the game.
Profile
Handles the current profile of the user.
ProfileManager
Profile manager is used to handle profiles - add, delete etc.
ProfileManagerController
The ProfileManagerController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
SaveBoardState
This class saves the current state of board, used when exiting application.
Score
Score - used to add to scoreboard
Scoreboard
Scoreboard - used to show top 10 players
ScoreboardController
ScoreboardController - used to manage fxml elements in scoreboard scene.
ScoreboardPlayer
ScoreboardPlayer - used to store and display player info
Settings
Handles user settings
SettingsController
The SettingsController used to manage UI interactions of this FXML.
SmartThief
A thief that works against the player by heading to the nearest loot/lever and collecting it, before leaving through the exit.
SpriteManager
The Sprite manager used to separate UI from backend.
StaticBoard
Static board used to store board related information across FXMLs.
Themes
Theme manager, allows user to select themes for there game
Themes.Theme
holds data for each theme
Themes.THEME_TYPE
Enum used to distinguish current theme
Tile
The tile class, handles and enforces rules on what can be held on a tile at any instance
TileColor
Represents the 6 possible colors of a tile.
